snippet: Late surges by Java’s War and Overanalyze were a boon for trainers Ken McPeek and Todd Pletcher and helped bring the field for the 20-horse Kentucky Derby into focus.
abstract: Late surges by racehorses Java’s War and Overanalyze are boon for trainers Ken McPeek and Todd Pletcher and are helping bring field for 20-horse Kentucky Derby into focus.
lead_paragraph: Late surges by Java’s War and Overanalyze were a boon for trainers Ken McPeek and Todd Pletcher and helped bring the field for the 20-horse Kentucky Derby into focus.

headline.seo: Java’s War Wins Blue Grass Stakes; Overanalyze Takes Arkansas Derby
headline.main: Java’s War Wins Blue Grass Stakes; Overanalyze Takes Arkansas Derby
headline.print_headline: As the Kentucky Derby Field Comes Into Focus, Two Trainers Like What They See
